name: DayDreamy Genie (Demo!)
description:
Daydreamy Genie is an upcoming Rpg maker Vx Ace developed by me, porkigod!

.

.

.

(This is my first try at making a game, please don't be too surprised if this demo is kinda doodoo...)

.

.

If you're having RTP issues, download Rpg makers Vx Ace's RTP :0 https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages

.

.

Known bugs: A collision bug in the last room -_-

Event glitch in the garden area?

.

.
